ac:Day.title: SAP Press Book
ac:Day.meta: Christiane Goebels, Denise Nepraunig, Thilo Seidel
ac:Day.description: The Comprehensive Guide - Transform your apps from simple Hello, World examples to enterprise-grade applications with this guide to UI5! Get the know-how to develop MVC apps, use OData, create data bindings, debug and test code, and more. Learn the dos and don’ts of SAPUI5 and everything in between, whether you’re implementing CRUD operations or writing your own controls. The dawn of the user is here. Can your apps keep up?
